titleStmt.title: Gods prerogative povver made known divers wayes in the Old and New Testament. Also the prerogative power of the Lord Christ. And what he will do in the dayes of his kingly office, in destroying his enemies, and exalting his saints. Very usefull for these times. / By him that loveth both truth and peace, Noah Banks.
titleStmt.author: Banks, Noah.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.B. and are to be sold at the West end of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
